quotes.quote: If all girls started wearing no makeup and comfortable clothes, guys would have no choice but to fall for girl because of natural beauty.
Wherever you go, whoever you meet, just remember that there is this person who loves you best when you have no makeup on.
Makeup can only make you look pretty on the outside, but it doesn't help if you're ugly on the inside. Unless you eat the makeup.
She's not wearing makeup so her face just looks like skin.
It's very often true that some women look better without makeup, but that's only during the day.
If you retain nothing else, always remember the most important rule of beauty which is, who cares?

My main beauty tip is don't say that negative thing when you look in the mirror. It just isn't healthyâ€¦That lack of beating up on ourselves â€” that's my new mantra. Happiness is the best makeup; a smile is better than any lipstick you'll put on.
I love not wearing maekup because I can just rub my eyes and nothing happens.
I believe that all women are pretty without makeup- but with the right makeup can be pretty powerful.
True beauty is wearing no makeup and being 100% okay with it.
Every girl wants a guy who she can run up to with her hair a mess, no makeup, and the first thing he says is "you're beautiful"
I've worked hard to feel beautiful in my natural skin. Personally, I don't ever want to depend on makeup to feel beautiful.
If you show up without makeup or looking sloppy, no matter how impressive your ideas are, no one is going to pay attention to you. People take you more seriously if you look polished.
I don't believe makeup and the right hairstyle alone can make a woman beautiful. The most radiant woman in the room is the one full of life and experience.
A man without makeup is like a cake without icing.
The beauty of a woman is not in her facial makeup but in the kindness of her soul.
A smile is the best makeup that any girl can wear.
Whether I'm wearing lots of makeup or no makeup, I'm always the same person inside.
I feel most beautiful at night, when I take my makeup off and it's just me.
The sweetest thing a guy said is that I look pretty with or without makeup.
There's no better makeup than self-confidence.
I always thought you were prettiest like this: No makeup, messy hair... Little sweaty.
Wake up and I'm feeling so hood / No make up and I still look good / Wake up and I feel so hood
I'm legit / With no makeup / Don't have to curl my hair up

Well I've seen you in jeans with no make-up on / And I've stood there in awe as your date for the prom / I'm blessed as a man to have seen you in white / But I've never seen anything quite like you tonight
She has the qualities of a queen, she's a queen / Ooo ooo what a natural beauty / No need no make-up to be a cutie / She's a queen, she's a queen
I like you in sweatpants, no makeup / even like your messed up hair / You're just perfect right when you wake up / You're so pretty when you don't care
You told me I look pretty with no makeup / You stay on my mind before I wake up
And when you wake up with no make-up / That's true beauty in my eyes / No matter how I try / I lose it when you smile
You don't wake up with that makeup on / I think you're better no makeup on / You got a problem? Just say what's wrong / Don't cover up
